definition: to shake/to flap/to vibrate/to resonate/to rise up with spirit/to rouse oneself

sentences.english: Chapter 1 begin with an introduction and overview of the computations of perturbative scattering amplitudes.
sentences.chinese: 第一章是关于微扰散射振幅计算的导论和概述。

sentences.english: The validity of homogeneous balance method for solving differential equation was shown by solving a new Hamilton amplitude equation.
sentences.chinese: 本文用齐次平衡方法求出了哈密顿振幅方程的精确解。

sentences.english: The bathymetric variation consists of a slowly varying component and a fast, small amplitude varying component.
sentences.chinese: 其中的地形变化包括慢变分量和小振幅快变分量。

sentences.english: But the amplitude when occurrence amyotrophy also decrescent.
sentences.chinese: 但出现肌萎缩时振幅也变小。

sentences.english: The optical field and the atomic coupling coefficient do not affect an atomic dipole amplitude square squeezing.
sentences.chinese: 光场与原子的耦合系数不影响原子偶极振幅平方压缩。

sentences.english: The sweeper cannot vibrate in high amplitude when sweeping the stuff.
sentences.chinese: 清扫器清扫物料时不会大振幅跳动。

sentences.english: In power card market, subscriber power card rise and drop half-and-half , but the oscillation amplitude squeezes obviously.
sentences.chinese: 权证市场上，认购权证涨跌参半，但振幅明显收窄。

sentences.english: The energy just gets bigger if the amplitude get bigger.
sentences.chinese: 如果振幅变大，能量就变大。

sentences.english: This represents successive stages of transfer of amplitude to later lobes .
sentences.chinese: 这代表振幅向后面波瓣传递的相继各阶段。

sentences.english: The open should act as one extreme of this range.
sentences.chinese: 开盘价应该作为当日振幅范围的一端。

sentences.english: If plotted on the same set of axes, the amplitude curve would be barely visible.
sentences.chinese: 如果对轴的相同集合绘图，振幅曲线几乎看不出来。

sentences.english: Further depolarization resulted in a decrease of amplitude.
sentences.chinese: 进一步去极化，振幅反而下降。

sentences.english: Online measurement of pulse amplitude by air purge was studied.
sentences.chinese: 采用吹气法在线测量脉冲萃取柱脉冲振幅参数。

sentences.english: This paper revises the homogeneous balance method and gets two exact solutions of Burgers KdV equation.
sentences.chinese: 本文用齐次平衡方法求出了哈密顿振幅方程的精确解。

sentences.english: Basics - Review of properties of E&M waves, amplitude, intensity, phase, polarization.
sentences.chinese: 电磁波性质的复习，振幅，强度，相位，极化。

definition: to shake up/to jolt/to vibrate/to oscillate/to fluctuate
Shanghai Stock Exchange (SSE), abbr. for 上海證券交易所|上海证券交易所[Shang4 hai3 Zheng4 quan4 Jiao1 yi4 suo3]
to undulate/to fluctuate/wave motion/rise and fall
extent of a rise (in prices etc)/amount of increase/growth (typically expressed as a percentage)
